reviews.text: Hi there all, went to purchase tickets for the next day travelling and week, I found that even on there website it clearly states Sunday 9am till 21:00, it wasn't open at this time at all, closed even at 6pm, clearly the station ticket office is unable to stick to an agreement that it has on its website, it amazes me how it survives, as its a busy station. I will be making a complaint about this and expect the staff to be working full shifts to staff this busy station... Andyc
Run down town centre not many beggers

Station has step free access to all platforms via lifts, though trains on most routes only have an hourly service here which is poor. You can get trains from here to London, Crewe, Coventry, Leicester and Birmingham.
Good station in terms of facilities and friendly staff I just wish trains were more frequent
